Calls handleIncomingFrame() for frames arrived from outside, and processFrame() for self messages.

00081         }

00084             int priority = msg->getSenderModule()->par("priority").longValue();
00085             if (priority > 0 && priority < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES)
00086             {
00087                 rcQueue[priority].insert(msg);
00088             }
00089             else
00090             {
00091                 rcQueue[0].insert(msg);
00092                 ev << "Priority missing!" << endl;
00093             }
00094         }
00095     }
00096     //Frames arrived on in are best-effort frames
00097     else if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00098     {
00099         // If there are framesRequested the MAC layer is currently idle
00100         if (framesRequested && isTransmissionAllowed((EtherFrame*) msg))
00101         {
00102             framesRequested--;
00103             send(msg, gateBaseId("out"));
00104         }
00105         else
00106         {
00107             beQueue.insert(msg);
00108             emit(beQueueLengthSignal, beQueue.length());

void TTEOutput::requestPacket (  )  [protected, virtual]

The queue should send a packet whenever this method is invoked. If the queue is currently empty, it should send a packet when when one becomes available.

Definition at line 152 of file TTEOutput.cc.
